root.name: Spy's Demise
root.description: Spy's Demise was first released on the Apple II in 1983 and then later ported to the Atari 8-bit, TI-99/4A and the Vector-06c. In it, the player moves their spy left and right to dodge moving elevators and make it to the top of each series of floors. As the player progressed, the game became more and more difficult by removing floors each level.
